column1: Funeral Services for Phyllis will be held on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at St. Olaf Lutheran Church
column4: Devils Lake with Rev. Jeff Nicla officiating. Burial will be at the Lakota Cemetery
column5: on Wednesday at 4:00 p.m. Visitation will be held at the Gilbertson Funeral Home
column6: Devils Lake on Tuesday from 4:00 p.m. until 7:00 p.m. and will continue at St. Olaf Lutheran Church on Wednesday one hour prior to the funeral service.
